thread.title: best hotel in paris
thread.title_full: best hotel in paris - Review of Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 886alexandraf
title: best hotel in paris
text:
the hotel la Tamise is the best place to stay if you are looking for a hotel that is peaceful quiet clean and feels like home. the staff is amazing and is always available for whatever you need.
breakfast is amazing
would highly recommend it to people travelling for business or families
